xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.5 Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.5.2 Akusalapada » 2.5.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
84.
1430Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
85.
1431Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1432Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1433Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1434(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetuup2.5.3 Abyākatapada >>
